DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Clinical diagnosis parotid tumor Patients receive surgery parotid tumor NTUH single surgeon ( Prof. Lou ) 2004/01 2012/12 Exclusion criterion : Inflammation infection disease parotid gland
